name: Kareena Shah
text: This place is ridiculous. We ordered our pizza and it never got delivered. Even when we tried to contact them they didn't pick up their phones. WORST COSTUMER SERVICE EVER. Wouldn't ever go back and would NEVER recommend it.

name: Juan Moreno
text: A promised 30 min pizza did not arrive until over an hour later, with very little cheese. No reason given or discount offered for the delay. It has been 3 years and I have yet to return to Pizza Hut. Domino's however is a great price and reliable.

name: Kevin Ristow
text: Absolutely the worst place EVER............ They said they do not have a delivery driver... When I got there they had a customer argueing how the driver must have deliveres to the wrong house as he never got his pizza. Then our order was â€¦More

name: karthick maha
text: Ordered large pizza and cinnabon rolls on T-Mobile deals..pizza is good

name: Cristoval Velazquez
text: I ordered a pizza, and it took for ever to get here, plus they made me walk half a block to grab my pizza when it was supposably supposed to be delivered to my house!

name: Sabbath Riojas
text: Lady messed up my order and when I asked why it was wrong, got told I'm wrong and to take my pizza anyway. It was a promo pizza too, so I don't see how they got it wrong?

name: Rao Kineda
text: Man this place sucks bad. Horrible service when walking in OR calling! They either hang up on you or just don't care. Plus the pizza always seems too well done. Forget this place, I'm never going again.

name: Khushvinder Singh
text: I just love the place, I mean they make the pizza so fast and treat you with love.

name: Shourjya Dasgupta
text:
Not clean. Staffs are extremely care less. When I walked in, the staffs were just gossiping and laughing among each other and didn't even care to come up to ask for the order. I waited for a while and had to call them.
Not going back here again.

name: Clockwork Orange
text: Worst pizza hut I've ever dealt with. Dont bother with them

name: RAIDER LIVE
text: Pretty much feels like a shop ran by teenagers,  they make mistakes,  can't take orders and have attitude.  Probably the worst pizza place I've ever been 2. Haven't had pizza hut in a long time.  I regret ever trying it.

name: Raghupathy K P
text: Tidy place and quick service. Friendly staff.

name: Dustin Perkins
text: Lied to us about having delivery drivers and had us come in after the order was made. Offered in store credit as compensation. Do not trust this location.

name: Chante Ross
text: Not happy it was dirty and they don't accept EBT even though on the website it says they did

name: Andres de Loera-Brust
text: I was surprised by how (relatively) expensive it was for such a low quality pizza.

name: Kenneth Mahan
text: They don't even deliver to Fairway Park and the quality of the pizza sucks

name: Reyna Saldana
text: Soooo rude and unprofessional

name: Gloria Ochoa
text: I gave two stars because they don't bother in delivering to my house anymore the wait is usually an hour for me and when the pizza gets here it's usually cold

name: Holle Noelle Gutierrez
text: Not clean inside, chewy pizza, waited over 10 minutes to talk to a manager after I was displeased with the food.

name: joshua oliveira
text: Absolutely disgusting. Go to Mike's

name: Jiappsy Reyes
text: They're rude they sound like teens and they hang up on you and they don't do delivery

name: Phemeto blackwing
text: Ordered online for delivery, 2.5hrs and nothing, no call or anything either. Tried to call the store but no one picks up the phone.

name: Dinesh Kumar
text: Good place

name: Sanjay Chaudhary

name: Jeannette Jebril

name: Jeremy D
text: They constantly forget sauces that you pay for, the pizza has come late and cold, and almost no deals on the website are accepted for online ordering.

name: Krissybaby 510
text: I would give no stars if I can.....they never answer the phones and the little girls there have ugly looks on there faces and they are very rude and have attitudes.
